titleStmt.title: The ciuilitie of childehode with the discipline and institucion of children, distributed in small and compe[n]dious chapiters / and translated oute of French into Englysh, by Thomas Paynell.
De civilitate morum puerilium. English. 1560
titleStmt.author: Erasmus, Desiderius, d. 1536.
Paynell, Thomas.

publicationStmt.publisher: By John Tisdale, dwellynge in Knyghte Ryders strete, nye vnto the Quenes [m?]aredrop,

notesStmt.note: Translation of Erasmus' "De civilitate morum puerilium"--Cf. STC (2nd ed.).
Place of publication and publisher from colophon.
Reproduction of original in the Pepys Library.

place.placeName: Knyghte Ryders strete, nye vnto the Quenes [m?]aredrop
